title_sort: bethuel smith to walt whitman, 22 october 1864
title: Bethuel Smith to Walt Whitman, 22 October 1864
text: burgOct 22 1864Dear friend waltI arrived home the 18 I had to stop over my view on account of sheridan fighting in the valley mother told me that you wanted me to stop & see you when I come home but it is to late now & I did not hear of it in time there is of considerable excitement here about the election.my health is not verry[very] good at present I have got diarrhea some I think that it is on account of the change of climate & of food that makes me so although I feel verry[very] wellno more at presentgood by FromB Smithto Friend WaltAddressBethuel Smith.GLens Falls.Warren. C.O.N.Y. Bethuel Smith to Walt Whitman, 22 October 1864
